avalancheActivity.highlights: Snow is generally considered stable after thaw.

snowpackStructure.highlights: Much snow has melted in thaw and the remaining snow is mostly considered homogeneous and stable.

travelAdvisory.comment: No reports of recent avalanches. Snow is considered mostly stable. New slabs may build up in the northern part of the country on Sunday and Monday.
travelAdvisory.highlights: No reports of recent avalanches. Snow is considered mostly stable. New slabs may build up in the northern part of the country on Sunday and Monday.

weatherForecast.highlights: Milt, úrkomulítið og hægur vindur framan af helgi. Bætir í vind úr NA-A á sunnudag með dálítilli vætu, aðallega rigningu en það gæti gránað í fjöll. Þurrt að mestu, kólnar og norðlægar áttir á mánudag.

avalancheActivity.highlights: Snow is mostly homogeneous and stable after thaw. New snow on Sunday evening and Monday may form unstable wind slabs.

snowpackStructure.highlights: Most of the snow is old, grainy and homogeneous. It has subsided and much melted. A little new snow was added in mountains of Thursday night 21.2. Snowfall is forecast on Sunday evening and Monday, and then new unstable wind slabs might form.

travelAdvisory.comment: No reports of recent avalanches. Snow is considered mostly stable. New slabs may build up in the northern part of the country on Sunday and Monday.
travelAdvisory.highlights: No reports of recent avalanches. Snow is considered mostly stable. New slabs may build up in the northern part of the country on Sunday and Monday.

weatherForecast.highlights: Lítilsháttar éljagangur í hægum vindi á laugardag. Hvessir úr NA á sunnudag og byrjar að snjóa eða élja um kvöldið. NA-N átt á mánudag með snjókomu.

avalancheActivity.highlights: Little snow came in easy E-winds on Thursday at higher elevations on top of the old firn. Easy W-winds with snowfall at higher elevations on Saturday, but stronger NE-winds on Sunday with snowfall

travelAdvisory.comment: No reports of recent avalanches. Snow is considered mostly stable. New slabs may build up in the northern part of the country on Sunday and Monday.
travelAdvisory.highlights: No reports of recent avalanches. Snow is considered mostly stable. New slabs may build up in the northern part of the country on Sunday and Monday.

weatherForecast.highlights: Hæg V-læg átt með snjókomu til fjalla, NA-strekkingur síðdegis á sunnudag með slyddu í byggð, hægari N-læg átt á mánudag með éljum

avalancheActivity.highlights: Snow is mostly considered homogenous and stable.

snowpackStructure.highlights: Most of the snow is old, homogenous and stable. There is little snow left in the lower parts of slopes. On Sunday, snow might fall at high elevations, but rain is expected at lower elevations.

travelAdvisory.comment: No reports of recent avalanches. Snow is considered mostly stable. New slabs may build up in the northern part of the country on Sunday and Monday.
travelAdvisory.highlights: No reports of recent avalanches. Snow is considered mostly stable. New slabs may build up in the northern part of the country on Sunday and Monday.

weatherForecast.highlights: Þurrt á laugardag. Á sunnudag er spáð rigningu í austanátt, mögulega snjókomu í hæstu fjöll. Úrkomulítið á mánudag.
